scripts.dev:tienda: docker compose -f tienda/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm --workspace tienda run dev
scripts.dev:bot: docker compose -f whatsapp-webhook/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm --workspace whatsapp-webhook run start:dev
scripts.up:all: docker compose -f tienda/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f whatsapp-webhook/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.down:all: docker compose -f tienda/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -f whatsapp-webhook/docker-compose.yml down
